column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////This ended up being the best breakfast I had while in Chicago. Very quaint. The entire restaurant was full of people
column2: but we got a table very quickly and had great service throughout. While looking at the menu
column3: the red velvet French toast caught my eye
column4: so I decided to try it. WOW
column5: was that a good decision. I'll keep this simple: any time I make my way back to Chicago in the future
column6: I'm gonna stop here. I definitely recommend them.
